main.name: Diogo Monteiro
main.description: I am currently writing my Masters Degree dissertation on decentralized e-voting systems using the Ethereum Blockchain
main.bio: I have travelled through 30 different countries in the last 14 months, sleeping in friends houses, train stations and hostels, meeting wonderful people and experiencing the world. I am also a geek at heart and love working on fascinating projects. I am an active member of ESN (Erasmus Student Network), trying everyday to give the best Erasmus experience to everyone that decides to study at my Alma Mater.

education.description: Ranked #1 in Portugal, Top 250 CS Universities in the World (Times Higher Education). Currently researching and writing my final dissertation.
During this Erasmus I was enlightened by a different way of teaching. I was able to conduct some research on the Ethereum blockchain, ÐApps and Smart Contracts.
This was truly a remarkable experience. I was fascinated by the fact that each practical laboratory had a different lecturer, specialist on the topic at hand.
The proximity between the Professors of this institution and the students creates a truly fantastic learning environment.
